About

I am Musyoka Morris. My professional interests are in projects that intersect Mathematics and Computer Science. More specific, I am enthusiastic about Machine Learning and Data Analytics. I am a pragmatic problem solver and a constant learner always searching and using the best tools and frameworks for a given problem.

Intersection of Computer Science and Mathematics.
